languages.text: "За вашей улыбкой, господин Бастьян, клубятся муреновые тени. Пускай другие их и не видят, но от моего взора вашему беспокойству не ускользнуть. Чего же вы боитесь? Гнева своей династии, если эти переговоры потерпят неудачу? Или гнева династии фон Валанциус?"

traits.locale_text: "За вашей улыбкой, господин Бастьян, клубятся муреновые тени. Пускай другие их и не видят, но от моего взора вашему беспокойству не ускользнуть. Чего же вы боитесь? Гнева своей династии, если эти переговоры потерпят неудачу? Или гнева династии фон Валанциус?"

languages.text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"
languages.original_text: "За вашей улыбкой, господин Бастьян, клубятся муреновые тени. Пускай другие их и не видят, но от моего взора вашему беспокойству не ускользнуть. Чего же вы боитесь? Гнева своей династии, если эти переговоры потерпят неудачу? Или гнева династии фон Валанциус?"

traits.locale_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

"Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

"Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

"Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

"Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

languages.text: 「マスター・バスティアン、あなたの笑顔の裏には影が渦巻いている。他の者たちには見えないかもしれないが、私の目はごまかせない。何を恐れるている？この交渉が結実しないことで受けるあなたの家の怒りを恐れているのか？それとも、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の怒りを恐れるか？」
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・バスティアン、あなたの笑顔の裏には影が渦巻いている。他の者たちには見えないかもしれないが、私の目はごまかせない。何を恐れるている？この交渉が結実しないことで受けるあなたの家の怒りを恐れているのか？それとも、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の怒りを恐れるか？」

languages.text: “巴斯蒂安大师，在你的微笑之后，盘旋着青蓝色的阴影。或许别人看不见你的忧虑，但它却逃不过我的眼睛。你在惧怕什么？如果谈判无果，你的家族会将怒火倾泻在你身上吗？或者说，你是在惧怕冯·瓦兰修斯家族的怒火？”
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: “巴斯蒂安大师，在你的微笑之后，盘旋着青蓝色的阴影。或许别人看不见你的忧虑，但它却逃不过我的眼睛。你在惧怕什么？如果谈判无果，你的家族会将怒火倾泻在你身上吗？或者说，你是在惧怕冯·瓦兰修斯家族的怒火？”

languages.text: «Tras su sonrisa, maestro Bastian, se arremolinan sombras azuladas. Puede que otros no la vean, pero su preocupación no se escapa de mi vista. ¿Qué teme? ¿La furia de su casa si las negociaciones resultan infructuosas? ¿O la furia de la casa von Valancius?».
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: «Tras su sonrisa, maestro Bastian, se arremolinan sombras azuladas. Puede que otros no la vean, pero su preocupación no se escapa de mi vista. ¿Qué teme? ¿La furia de su casa si las negociaciones resultan infructuosas? ¿O la furia de la casa von Valancius?».

languages.text: « Derrière votre sourire, maître Bastian, je perçois des ombres d'un bleu vert. Vous pouvez peut-être dissimuler votre inquiétude à mes associés, mais pas à moi. De quoi avez-vous peur ? De la fureur de votre maison, si vous ne parvenez pas à clore les négociations ? Ou du ressentiment de la maison von Valancius ? »
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: « Derrière votre sourire, maître Bastian, je perçois des ombres d'un bleu vert. Vous pouvez peut-être dissimuler votre inquiétude à mes associés, mais pas à moi. De quoi avez-vous peur ? De la fureur de votre maison, si vous ne parvenez pas à clore les négociations ? Ou du ressentiment de la maison von Valancius ? »

languages.text: "Herr Bastian, hinter Eurem Lächeln wirbeln blaugrüne Schatten. Andere mögen sie nicht sehen, aber meinem Auge entgeht Eure Sorge nicht. Wovor habt Ihr Angst? Dem Zorn Eures Hauses, sollten diese Verhandlungen fruchtlos verlaufen? Oder dem Zorn des Hauses von Valancius?"
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: "Herr Bastian, hinter Eurem Lächeln wirbeln blaugrüne Schatten. Andere mögen sie nicht sehen, aber meinem Auge entgeht Eure Sorge nicht. Wovor habt Ihr Angst? Dem Zorn Eures Hauses, sollten diese Verhandlungen fruchtlos verlaufen? Oder dem Zorn des Hauses von Valancius?"

languages.text: "Üstat Bastian, gülümsemenizin ardında masmavi gölgeler saklı. Telaşınızı diğerlerinden saklamayı başarabilirsiniz ancak benim gözümden kaçmaz. Neden korkuyorsunuz? Müzakereler başarısız olursa hanenizin vereceği tepkiden mi? Yoksa von Valancius Hanesi'nin gazabından mı?"
languages.original_text: "Behind your smile, Master Bastian, teal shadows swirl. Others may not see them, but your worry cannot escape my eye. What are you afraid of? Your house's wrath should these negotiations prove fruitless? Or the wrath of House von Valancius?"

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Bastian, gülümsemenizin ardında gölgeler pusuda bekliyor. Diğerlerinden saklamayı başarabilirsiniz ancak telaşınız benim gözümden kaçmaz. Neden korkuyorsunuz? Müzakereler başarısız olursa hanenizin vereceği tepkiden mi? Yoksa von Valancius Hanesi'nin gazabından mı?"
